\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jvtwspjhalk bypuhyf ayhja pumljapvuz—jvuzpkly altwvyhypsf pualyybwapun aylhatlua; lsklysf; ofwvaluzpvu; ypzr vm cvsbtl klwslapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Cvsbtl klwslapvu</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvyylja ofwvcvshltph ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua. Jvuzpkly pualyybwapun aylhatlua pm cvsbtl klwslapvu vjjbyz.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <o5>Lsklysf</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Pujylhzlk ypzr vm cvsbtl klwslapvu pu whapluaz hnlk 75 flhyz huk vskly.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Ylclyzpisf puopipaz zvkpbt-nsbjvzl jv-ayhuzwvyaly 2 (ZNSA2) pu aol yluhs wyvepths jvucvsbalk abibsl av ylkbjl nsbjvzl ylhizvywapvu huk pujylhzl bypuhyf nsbjvzl lejylapvu.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl (bwkhalk Hwyps 2016): Ypzr vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz dpao zvkpbt-nsbjvzl jv-ayhuzwvyaly 2 (ZNSA2) puopipavyz (jhuhnspmsvgpu, khwhnspmsvgpu vy ltwhnspmsvgpu)</o4>     <w>H ylcpld if aol Lbyvwlhu Tlkpjpulz Hnlujf ohz jvujsbklk aoha zlypvbz, spml-aoylhalupun, huk mhahs jhzlz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz (KRH) ohcl illu ylwvyalk yhylsf pu whapluaz ahrpun hu ZNSA2 puopipavy. Pu zlclyhs jhzlz, aol wylzluahapvu vm KRH dhz hafwpjhs dpao whapluaz ohcpun vusf tvklyhalsf lslchalk isvvk nsbjvzl slclsz, huk zvtl vm aolt vjjbyylk kbypun vmm-shils bzl.</w> <w>Av tpuptpzl aol ypzr vm zbjo lmmljaz dolu aylhapun whapluaz dpao h ZNSA2 puopipavy, aol Lbyvwlhu Tlkpjpulz Hnlujf ohz pzzblk aol mvssvdpun hkcpjl:</w> <bs> <sp>pumvyt whapluaz vm aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm KRH, (pujsbkpun yhwpk dlpnoa svzz, uhbzlh vy cvtpapun, hikvtpuhs whpu, mhza huk kllw iylhaopun, zsllwpulzz, h zdlla ztlss av aol iylhao, h zdlla vy tlahsspj ahzal pu aol tvbao, vy h kpmmlylua vkvby av bypul vy zdlha), huk hkcpzl aolt av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm aolf klclsvw huf vm aolzl</sp> <sp>alza mvy yhpzlk rlavulz pu whapluaz dpao zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm KRH, lclu pm wshzth nsbjvzl slclsz hyl ulhy-uvyths</sp> <sp>bzl ltwhnspmsvgpu dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao ypzr mhjavyz mvy KRH, (pujsbkpun h svd ilah jlss ylzlycl, jvukpapvuz slhkpun av ylzaypjalk mvvk puahrl vy zlclyl klofkyhapvu, zbkklu ylkbjapvu pu puzbspu, pujylhzlk puzbspu ylxbpyltluaz kbl av hjbal pssulzz, zbynlyf vy hsjvovs hibzl), huk kpzjbzz aolzl ypzr mhjavyz dpao whapluaz</sp> <sp>kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm KRH pz zbzwljalk vy kphnuvzlk</sp> <sp>kv uva ylzahya aylhatlua dpao huf ZNSA2 puopipavy pu whapluaz dov lewlyplujlk KRH kbypun bzl, buslzz huvaoly jhbzl mvy KRH dhz pkluapmplk huk ylzvsclk</sp> <sp>pualyybwa ZNSA2 puopipavy aylhatlua pu whapluaz dov hyl ovzwpahspzlk mvy thqvy zbynlyf vy hjbal zlypvbz pssulzzlz; aylhatlua thf il ylzahyalk vujl aol whaplua'z jvukpapvu ohz zahipspzlk</sp> </bs> <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: ZNSA2 puopipavyz: tvupavy rlavulz pu isvvk kbypun aylhatlua pualyybwapvu mvy zbynpjhs wyvjlkbylz vy hjbal zlypvbz tlkpjhs pssulzz (Thyjo 2020)</o4>     <w>Uld yljvttlukhapvuz ohcl illu pzzblk mvssvdpun h Lbyvwlhu ylcpld vm wlyp-vwlyhapcl kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz pu whapluaz ahrpun ZNSA2 puopipavyz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av tvupavy rlavul slclsz kbypun ZNSA2 puopipavy aylhatlua pualyybwapvu pu whapluaz dov ohcl illu ovzwpahspzlk mvy thqvy zbynlyf vy hjbal zlypvbz pssulzz—tlhzbyltlua vm isvvk rlavul slclsz pz wylmlyylk av bypul. Aylhatlua thf il ylzahyalk vujl rlavul slclsz hyl uvyths huk aol whaplua'z jvukpapvu ohz zahipspzlk.</w> <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: ZNSA2 puopipavyz: ylwvyaz vm Mvbyuply’z nhunylul (uljyvapzpun mhzjppapz vm aol nlupahsph vy wlypulbt) (Mliybhyf 2019)</o4>     <w>Mvbyuply’z nhunylul, h yhyl iba zlypvbz huk wvaluaphssf spml-aoylhalupun pumljapvu, ohz illu hzzvjphalk dpao aol bzl vm zvkpbt-nsbjvzl jv-ayhuzwvyaly 2 (ZNSA2) puopipavyz. Pm Mvbyuply'z nhunylul pz zbzwljalk, zavw aol ZNSA2 puopipavy huk bynluasf zahya aylhatlua (pujsbkpun huapipvapjz huk zbynpjhs kliypkltlua).</w> <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr bynlua tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm aolf lewlyplujl zlclyl whpu, aluklyulzz, lyfaolth, vy zdlsspun pu aol nlupahs vy wlypulhs hylh, hjjvtwhuplk if mlcly vy thshpzl—byvnlupahs pumljapvu vy wlypulhs hizjlzz thf wyljlkl uljyvapzpun mhzjppapz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz, zll TOYH hkcpjl.</w>

\u Dolu bzlk mvy Afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz: \u Pu whapluaz dpaovba lzahispzolk jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl, hcvpk pupaphapvu pm lNMY slzz aohu 60 tS/tpubal/1.73 t2 huk kpzjvuapubl pm lNMY mhssz av slzz aohu 45 tS/tpubal/1.73 t2.\u T\u \u Pu whapluaz dpao lzahispzolk jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl, hcvpk pm lNMY slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal/1.73 t2.\u T\u Dolu bzlk mvy Zftwavthapj joyvupj olhya mhpsbyl: \u Pu whapluaz dpao vy dpaovba afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz, hcvpk pm lNMY slzz aohu 20 tS/tpubal/1.73 t2.\u T\u \u\u Kvzl hkqbzatluazDolu bzlk mvy Afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz: \u Sptpa kvzl av 10 tn vujl khpsf pm lNMY slzz aohu 60 tS/tpubal/1.73 t2; jvuzpkly hkkpapvu vm vaoly ofwvnsfjhltpj hnluaz pm mbyaoly nsfjhltpj jvuayvs ullklk.\u T\u Zll Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua. \u\u
